front.title: Data Model of Interface to Network Security Functions Service Interface

abstract.t: This draft proposes a generic and intent-driven data model for NSF security policy configuration used by I2NSF clients to negotiate their security requirements with various kinds of entities that each provide one or more NSFs. The Role Based Access Control (RBAC) reference model [INCITS359 RBAC] is used to represent which operations can be performed on what set of secured objects.
